content.question: What comes to mind when you think of earth? What does nature constitute of?
Act out the journey of a water drop from the ocean to your faucet - where does it travel?
If your pipe at home runs dry, can you just open a straw and drink from Sungai Klang? Why or why not?
If Earth was a big kuih lapis, what makes each layer different - the crunchy crust, the gooey middle or the super hot inside?
content.description: Go all in describing the details!

content.question: Why is Earth considered the only home for living organisms?

choices.text: Because it has water, air, and suitable temperatures
Because it is the closest planet to the Sun
Because it has many mountains and deserts

content.question: Why cant most other planets in our solar system support life as Earth does?

choices.text: They are too far from the Sun
They lack liquid water and breathable air

content.question: Youre a rock getting squished and heated! What kind of a rock are you? Strike a metamorphosis pose!

content.title: Spot the word, Rock the Test
content.content:

-magma, magma chamber, volcanic eruption, lava, high pressure

content.content:
Endogenic Process

content.question: Hot Core Actors, its your time to shine! Act out the heat and pressure building under Earths surface. What would it create?
content.description: Show us the power of Earths inner engine!

content.question: What is the estimated age of the Earth?
